  physical_appearance: \This is a Qing dynasty dish and its interior is decorated with the \\China aster\\ pattern. While the outer rim consists of repeated asters divided by a thin free-handed stroke

  subject_terms_1: the center of the dish is comprised of five aster flower heads surrounded by repeated swirl motifs. A leaf motif as well as three stickers and its accession number can be found on the underside of the dish. \ stamps (marks) floral patterns symbolism
